MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY23 postcode area of Aberystwyth, affecting properties in Rhosygarth and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigation needed to locate and repair  the fault on our overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12 Noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:32 AM on 4th December 2020.
